CustomField.description: Time the task has been waiting in the queue in seconds.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Time the task has been waiting in the queue in seconds.
CustomField.formula: IF ( ISBLANK(LastRunStartTime__c) && ISBLANK(LastRunEndTime__c), (NOW() - CreatedDate)*24*60*60, IF( IsCompleted__c == false, (NOW() - LastRunEndTime__c)*24*60*60, NULL))
CustomField.label: Time in queue
